title: Copd Resources For Patients And Their Families
content:
The COPD National Action Plan
is the first-ever blueprint for how we can all work together—across communities and sectors—to raise awareness of COPD and reduce its impact. The Plan was developed at the request of Congress, with input from the broad COPD community. This included patients, caregivers, federal agencies, nonprofits, researchers, policymakers, industry representatives, and advocates. Check it out to see how you can play a role:
COPD National Action Plan
May 15, 2024
